text: O naya bangwe nonofo ya go dira dikgakgamatso, ba bangwe nonofo ya go porofesa le go rera, o naya mongwe nonofo ya go itse fa mewa e e bosula e bua mo go ba ba ipitsang gore ba naya melaetsa ya Modimo, kgotsa gore a ke one tota Mowa wa Modimo o o buang. Fela jalo, motho yo mongwe o kgona go bua dipuo tse a iseng a ke a di ithute; mme ba bangwe ba ba sa itseng puo, ba newa nonofo ya go tlhaloganya se a se buang.
